a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total population living in extreme poverty by world region
Extreme poverty is defined as living below the International Poverty Line of $2.15 per day.
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2024)
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices to account for inflation and differences in the cost of living between
countries. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, per capita.
